SELECT u.USER_ID USER_ID, u.GROUP_ID GROUP_ID, j.CODE_LEVEL CODE_LEVEL FROM tbl_user u INNER JOIN MST_GROUP g ON g.GROUP_ID = u.GROUP_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_DETAIL_USER_JAPAN d ON d.USER_ID = u.USER_ID LEFT JOIN MST_JAPANSE j ON j.CODE_LEVEL = d.CODE_LEVEL WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId}
